content.desc: FILIPINOS in the United Arab Emirates (UAE) just celebrated over the weekend our host country's 47th National Day. There were many festivities held across.

content.title: Yong Ju Lee and Atelier KJ Create Design for Korean Pavilion at Expo 2020 Dubai - ArchDaily
content.desc: Elusive Boundary Pavilion. Image Courtesy of Yong Ju Lee Architecture + Atelier KJ Yong Ju Lee Architecture and Atelier KJ have created "Elusive Boundary" for the Korean Pavilion at Expo 2020 Dubai. The project is designed as a place for radical encounters of different fields. The main theme of Korean Pavilion, Mobility, is defined as a new space of possibility created by movement between territories and escape/expansion to new territories. The movement defined by new mobility is not linear, but a simultaneous event between territories. Elusive Boundary Pavilion. Image Courtesy of Yong Ju L...
